data.title: LeakyCon Portland: Full Schedule
data.meta_description: Check out the schedule for LeakyCon Portland
data.text:
Hi there! Welcome to the LeakyCon Sched.org! Please note, that signing up for this site or indicating which sessions you will be at is not at all required. You cannot reserve a seat to a session on this site; if a session looks "full" it’s only because we input the capacity of the rooms. All sessions at LeakyCon are first-come first-serve except for the autograph and photo-booth sessions that indicate otherwise. Lit programming may still only be attended by those who have a Lit badge (these are now sold out). Again: you do not have to sign up for this site or use it in any way in order to go to any event at LeakyCon. it’s a way for you to find other people who are interested in the same things you are, and a way for you to show your friends on Facebook, Twitter, and beyond what you’re interested in at the conference. But it is not in ANY way a ticketing system. We hope you enjoy surfing the schedule!

Sign up or log in to bookmark your favorites and sync them to your phone or calendar.

MainStage clear filter

5:00pm PDT

Opening Ceremony

Every year we open LeakyCon in our own crazed wizardly way. As usual, we aren't listing who is in this one just yet. You will just have to come and see! Put this in your schedule. You'll notice no one is listed on this! That's because it's all a surprise! (So if you know, be a good human and don't tell. :)

Thursday June 27, 2013 5:00pm - 6:30pm PDT

Mainstage - Exhibit Hall D

8:00pm PDT

Rock Concert!

LeakyCon music events are always epic - don't miss this one! Featuring:

Ministry of Magic

Alex Carpenter

Tonks & the Aurors

Lauren Fairweather

Kirstyn Hippe

Thursday June 27, 2013 8:00pm - 11:50pm PDT

Mainstage - Exhibit Hall D

MainStage

Tags Music

10:00am PDT

Not Literally, Literally Live!

You know them from their sharp pop culture parodies on YouTube; now come and see them perform live! From Harry Potter, The Hunger Games, Doctor Who, Game of Thrones, these girls have parodied it all. Their live show is a chance to kick back and have fun and sing along.

Friday June 28, 2013 10:00am - 10:20am PDT

Mainstage - Exhibit Hall D

11:00am PDT

Featured Actresses: Jackie Emerson, Scarlett Byrne, and Ellie Darcey-Alden

These lovely ladies have been strong support on some of the biggest blockbusters of our time: Jackie Emerson was inside the circle of tributes for The Hunger Games; Scarlett and Ellie, part of the most elaborate set of mega-films ever. Whether your question interest lies with The Hunger Games, Harry Potter, or Doctor Who, these girls will provide unique perspective about life inside the making of some of the most important cultural markers today and the fandoms that surround them.

Friday June 28, 2013 11:00am - 11:50am PDT

Mainstage - Exhibit Hall D

12:00pm PDT

The Lizzie Bennet Diaries Extravaganza

The Lizzie Bennet Diaries returns to Leaky! We just loved meeting the girls of LBD last year; this year, with the whole series wrapped up and a DVD on the way - thanks to a Kickstarter that raised over eight times its goal! - the entire cast, plus the writers and producers, will take some time to reflect on the experience together. It's their first big appearance together! Come join us to talk about this ground-breaking web series and hear insights on how they brought this Jane Austen classic into the world of vlogging.

Friday June 28, 2013 12:00pm - 12:50pm PDT

Mainstage - Exhibit Hall D

1:00pm PDT

The Joe Moses One-Man Showses

(People appearing may change before the show!)

Friday June 28, 2013 1:00pm - 1:50pm PDT

Mainstage - Exhibit Hall D

3:00pm PDT

The Second Annual LeakyStars Competition!

Cheer on the finalists as they compete to become the second LeakyStars winner. Our first winner, Kristyn Hippe, will be there to perform too! This is a true celebration of the amazing talent found in fandom. Our judges will be Anthony Rapp of Rent fame, Pat Brady of Team StarKid, and three of our favorite singers from Glee. The winner will not only become our second LeakyStars winner, but will be invited to perform an audition at talent agency CESD, which reps the likes of Darren Criss, Hayden Panettiere, Burt Reynolds, Jim Dale, and many more. Don't miss it!

Friday June 28, 2013 3:00pm - 4:50pm PDT

Mainstage - Exhibit Hall D

5:00pm PDT

The Hogwarts Alumni Event: Devon, Ellie, and Scarlett

We are proud to present Devon Murray, Scarlett Byrne and Elle Darcey-Alden together for our actor's panel. We'll talk about their experiences on and off the Harry Potter set. We'll also learn what they have coming up next so we can continue to support these fantastic actors we love. The audience will be able to ask questions so come prepared to step up to the microphone!

Friday June 28, 2013 5:00pm - 5:50pm PDT

Mainstage - Exhibit Hall D

8:00pm PDT

Rock Concert II!

LeakyCon Friday night rock shows: they have always been epic. This one will be no exception!

Featuring:

The Doubleclicks

Rae Sterling

Justin Finch-Fletchley and the Sugar Quills

Hank Green

Whomping Willows

Harry and the Potters

Friday June 28, 2013 8:00pm - 11:59pm PDT

Mainstage - Exhibit Hall D

9:00am PDT

11:00am PDT

1:00pm PDT

Buffy the Vampire Alum Panel and Q&A

“It’s wonderful to get lost in a story, isn’t it?” Andrew (Storyteller, 7.16)

Many of us found ourselves lost in the world of Joss Whedon’s Buffy the Vampire Slayer. Come reminisce with two of the amazing actors who brought this world alive for us. Amber Benson and Tom Lenk join us for a look back at their experiences during Buffy. We’ll also hear about what they have been up to since Buffy saved us from the final apocalypse of the series. Audience members will be able to step up to the mic and ask questions.

Saturday June 29, 2013 1:00pm - 1:50pm PDT

Mainstage - Exhibit Hall D

4:00pm PDT

A Very StarKid Event III

Portland’s A Very StarKid Event will feature performances from the entire Very Potter Musical catalog. We are so excited to welcome these incredibly talented (and hilarious) performers back to LeakyCon.

Saturday June 29, 2013 4:00pm - 5:50pm PDT

Mainstage - Exhibit Hall D

8:00pm PDT

10:00am PDT

The Giant Team StarKid Panel

How about a little more StarKid before you head home? You'd like that? Alright then - join the StarKid team as they share what they've been up to this year and what amazing things they have in store next.

Sunday June 30, 2013 10:00am - 10:50am PDT

Mainstage - Exhibit Hall D

11:00am PDT

Apex Screening and Panel

The cast and creators of Apex will discuss the film and the stories behind making this independent project. Apex deals with a group of lifelong friends who find themselves quarantined in California. Information is scarce; supplies even more so, and while their relationships slowly devolve into past struggles, something far more sinister lurks beyond their luxurious duplex apartment… and inside of them.

Sunday June 30, 2013 11:00am - 12:50pm PDT

Mainstage - Exhibit Hall D

2:00pm PDT

The Last PotterCast / Portland Closing

The final event of LeakyCon, and the last full PotterCast. Join John, Frak, and Melissa, as they talk about the memories of the weekend, and bring on special guests for tomfoolery, game playing, and reminiscing.

You never know who is going to show up on PotterCast, so be sure to be there!

Sunday June 30, 2013 2:00pm - 3:30pm PDT

Mainstage - Exhibit Hall D
